name: Adrift in Dreams Workflowy Style
additional_info:
This is cobbled together from several of the Workflowy styles here. I didn't write any original code for this style. These guys are amazing.

Workflowy.com - Misc CSS Changes by seanwcom: http://userstyles.org/styles/58901/workflowy-com-misc-css-changes
Monokai for Workflowy by s0und: http://userstyles.org/styles/58654/monokai-for-workflowy

And a beautiful palette from ColourLovers:

Adrift in Dreams by skyblue2u: http://www.colourlovers.com/palette/580974/Adrift_in_Dreams

In case you can't tell from the screenshot, the bullet color can also be customized! Check out the comments in the CSS to add your own colors.
